Sentencas: Co-doped praseodymium nickelates PrNi1-xCoxO3-delta and their composites with yttrium doped ceria Ce0.9Y0.1O2-delta are known to be promising materials for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells and membranes for oxygen separation.
Titulo: The effect of microwave sintering on stability and oxygen mobility of praseodymium nickelates-cobaltites and their nanocomposites

Sentencas: Powdered samples were obtained via Pechini route and ultrasonic dispersion followed by mechanical activation.
Titulo: The effect of microwave sintering on stability and oxygen mobility of praseodymium nickelates-cobaltites and their nanocomposites

Sentencas: Pellets were sintered at 870-1100 degrees C by using microwave radiation.
Titulo: The effect of microwave sintering on stability and oxygen mobility of praseodymium nickelates-cobaltites and their nanocomposites

Sentencas: In comparison with conventionally sintered materials, the phase transition leading to Ruddlesden-Popper phase formation was shifted down for about 50 degrees C-100 degrees C
Titulo: The effect of microwave sintering on stability and oxygen mobility of praseodymium nickelates-cobaltites and their nanocomposites

Sentencas: The effect of sintering by microwave radiation consisted of dramatically increased sample density, improved phase purity and enhanced oxygen mobility.
Titulo: The effect of microwave sintering on stability and oxygen mobility of praseodymium nickelates-cobaltites and their nanocomposites

Sentencas: When undesirable phase transitions at elevated sintering temperatures hinder gas-tight layers preparation, the microwave sintering technique can be used without any deterioration of transport properties of materials in comparison with conventional calcination.
Titulo: The effect of microwave sintering on stability and oxygen mobility of praseodymium nickelates-cobaltites and their nanocomposites
